attributes.action: Protest against the UK government decision for visa processing for Bangladeshi nationals in Delhi, India
attributes.additional_details:
Through a strong diaspora, aid, historic and cultural links, the UK perceived as the Bangladesh’s good partner in the South East Asia.

The UK’s attempt to shift its Visa Processing from Bangladesh to India has not only put strain in the UK-Bangladesh relationship, also given birth to complexities and no doubt it has increased the hassles in the process.

We should not forget our Curry Industry. The Curry Industry in Great Britain, which generates estimated £4.2 billions annually to our economy, are mainly because of the contribution from people of Bangladeshi origin.

The Curry Life Magazine, which is widely regarded as the authoritative voice of the Curry Industry in Great Britain launching this campaign against this Government Decision.

Syed Belal Ahmed
Editor
Curry Life Magazine
info@currylifemagazine.com
www.currylifemagazine.com
